channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When Stinkweasel drops a rain of yukkiness onto the forest, the Fairy Squad, with their excellent flying skills, decide they are the ones for the job. However, Hoofius insists this should be their quest, even if he does hate ick! And when the Fairy Squad get their wings gunked and are unable to fly, the heroes can resume their quest to end Stinkweasel?s reign of stinky nonsense - no flying required.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Agents Opal and Omar uncover the location of a legendary odd artifact.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Agents Opal and Omar uncover the location of a legendary odd artifact.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Owen has his superball confiscated, so the gang set off to retrieve it from Chef?s office.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Marinette discovers a secret that nothing could have prepared her for.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Liko and friends show their strength in a battle against Gibeon and the White Zygarde.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: In the aftermath of their Fusion setback, Glen gives the Scions a needed boost with a powerful invention: an antidote to Graven?s mind-altering Skourge. It comes just in time, as Graven and his lieutenant, Baron Durghon, launch a ferocious assault by poisoning the town?s water supply with Skourge.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Brawl pits Ariana and Michelle against each other as Lucien shakes up regionals rehearsals. Meanwhile, Izzy tries to overcome their dance captain doubts.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter Challenges
channel.desc: Challenges, celebrities, makes and adventures with the Blue Peter team.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: The Farmer has taken up beekeeping and is loving all the honey produced by the hive. However, when he discards his protective suit, the swarm move in, bringing it to life! Soon, the ?Bee-Man? is bossing Bitzer around.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When the Danger Agency?s public approval ratings plummet, Colonel K brings in a truly out-of-this-world PR guru to help put things right. Alarmingly for Danger Mouse and Penfold, that guru turns out to be the galaxy?s biggest trickster ? Quark! DM is soon won over after seeing Quark demonstrate his Exaggerator Device: an invention that spins even the most mundane event into an outrageously overblown display of awesomeness. With the help of the Exaggerator, DM?s popularity skyrockets to dizzying heights, but fame comes at a price. And when Quark starts making Danger Mouse look villainous, DM will have to convince the world he?s not the criminal everyone thinks he is.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: When the gang go on an adventure in search of the Beanotown Yeti, Walter follows with plans of his own for the rare beast, and Dennis and his chums must come to its rescue.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When the kids won't stop being loud, Mouse uses an invention that causes the others to swap voices so they can hear how irritating they sound. At first the kids have fun with each other?s voices, using them to playing tricks - but how will Boy get through school when all he can say is ?meow?.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to play hide-and-seek in the savannah.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings organise a mega-party, leading to the cabin being invaded by bats.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit faces a series of odd challenges that only Orla knows how to stop.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: Stuck in a time loop, Charlie and Que don't need to stop and pause when a monster attacks, as they can play all day long! But they need an exit once reality starts skipping.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Herbert is starting to feel his age and secretly drinks from the Fountain of Youth. However, his desire to be young puts the whole quest in jeopardy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: It?s the annual five-a-side challenge match against the rival leisure centre, and team captain Lance knows exactly what position to play Danny and Mick in: the laundry room, well away from anywhere they can do anything that will cost them the game. However, a tiny accident with the kit leads to a mass walk-out from the team, and it?s up to Danny, Mick, and three other dummies to take to the field for the beautiful game and become leisure centre legends.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Get Arty
channel.desc: The Kwapongs bowl into space with DIY alien skittles, Emma Stothard weaves a wicker dog, and Kiell Smith-Bynoe draws a ghost so spooked, it?s nearly see-through.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings discover tai chi movements that generate balls of energy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gangsta Granny Strikes Again
channel.desc: Ben is getting used to life without his beloved Granny, but when priceless artefacts are stolen by someone pretending to be the Black Cat, he sets out to discover who the culprit is.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Loveykins
channel.desc: A tale from Quentin Blake's Box of Treasures. After a storm, Angela Bowling discovers a small helpless, abandoned bird which she lavishes with care and attention. She feeds Augustus (her little 'Loveykins') with the finest cakes and sweets. However, as he grows bigger and bigger, he longs for more bird-style treats such as worms and bugs.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: It's time for the racket game, where big scores mean big prizes.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: So Awkward Academy
channel.desc: Alien zombies, space monks, a demon clown, an evil knight and a world record attempt -it's just another day at Cranmede Academy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: A Kind of Spark
channel.desc: Addie finds a mysterious locked safe in the bookshop basement. Meanwhile, Keedie confronts her old friend Bonnie, and Audrey has a secret of her own.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: The going gets tough at the Wigmo Cup. Andrew tries to help Christina rediscover her form, while Coach Byrne takes Mason off for a father-son activity day.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly Mission Shark
channel.desc: In this episode, part of the team explores the mangroves, which are essential for the survival of some sharks. While there, they come face to face with baby lemon sharks. Back on dry land, the rest of the team are learning more about North Bimini?s main tourist area ? Alice Town. It?s a chance for the shark saviours to relax, see the sights and play a quick game of frisbee on the beach before everyone reunites for the next phase of their training.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: After the band get sucked into a computer game, novice gamer Andy must pick up a controller and play. With Whiff as his guide, can Andy complete the game and rescue the Odd Socks.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: It?s time to go undercover and discover who makes the best spy. Laser mazes, gadgets and creative camouflage - only one spy will take the win.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: Rising seas send Calico Jack and Kwazii on a hunt, where they encounter a sand cat.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Whilst exploring deep space, a meteor strikes Cosima and Dad's ship! After crash-landing on the unexplored planet of Proxima, Cosima makes a new best friend called Big Lizard.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: It?s staff appreciation day at Danger HQ, and Squawk and Danger Mouse have two very different ideas on where to go. Penfold has the deciding vote, so the pair are busy trying to convince Penfold to pick their choice. With Penfold busy inventing tasks so they can earn his favour, no one has noticed that a jam spillage in the professor?s experiment has brought a sticky surprise to life - a super-sized jam monster which might just ruin all of their plans.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis needs to pull off a magnificent stunt to save the skate park from closure, so Gran gives him the skateboard of the legendary Kendo 360 to help. When the special board goes missing at the worst possible moment, Dennis needs to dig deep and realise that it's the skater and not the board that's important.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Twinkle is unhappy with how easy questing has become since Cral the Eagle joined the heroes, offending the eagle just when they need him the most.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: No longer dance captain, Anthony finds following orders difficult. Jett and Ariana try to be friends again, while Heath?s history with Daisy complicates things with Pascale.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Liko?s partnership is put to the test after an accident causes Sprigatito to return home.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Taffy
channel.desc: Mrs Muchmore loses her fortune in investing in a vintage pencil scam. Everyone needs to vacate the mansion and live the simple life from now on. As Bentley and Forsythe vow to stick by their mistress, it is not the case for Taffy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Deep
channel.desc: The Nektons find an amazing underwater crop circle. It?s been built by a giant male puffer fish to attract a mate! Can Ant help the romance along.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis gets into a fluffy mess when he runs into Von Screwtop's hadron collider with the professor's pet hamster, Galahad. To stop Dennis from completely changing into a hamster, the gang must sneak him into Wilbur's lab to use his reverse hadron collider and change him back.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Squawkencluck reboots the now 100 per cent reliable Big Head base computer, which immediately locks up everyone in a maximum security prison.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: After breaking a carriage belonging to his beloved Princess, a besotted Prince orders another one from the Ninjas - but the Princess only has eyes for the Ninja Van.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation set on a remote rural farm. Shaun's flock lives a peaceful life under the watchful eye of their sheepdog Bitzer. The flock are enjoying a boogie when a freshly dug molehill interrupts their fun. Shaun has to resort to ever more extreme attempts to get rid of the pesky mole.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings organise a drone race throughout the cabin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Boy and Girl have a contest to see whose best friend is the best of the best. However, after taking it too far, they are in danger of losing their best friends forever.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Herbert has invented a new contraption to help him fly using an old set of bagpipes. The 'Herbecopter', as Herbert likes to call it, is rather noisy but extremely effective, and Twinkle is unhappy at no longer being the only flying hero. So, when the heroes quest to get Friendlyface?s priceless locket back from a dragon, Twinkle and Herbert become extremely competitive and risk completely failing the quest.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Agents Opal and Omar uncover the location of a legendary odd artifact.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Agents Opal and Omar uncover the location of a legendary odd artifact.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Jude befriends a chicken with an attitude when an unusual petting zoo visits the school.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Is it the final day for Monarch, Ladybug and Cat Noir.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Terapagos uses its power to purify Laqua, but a new threat waits in the shadows.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: Insecurity begins to eat away at the Scions, which is just the opening Graven needs to try to drive the team apart by targeting Glen as the weak link. With Myridell absent on her mission back on Gorm, the Scions and their Gormiti rally against Graven?s generals with the help of a surprising ally.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: The Brawl kicks off, and A-Troupe is there to support the Brawlers. Meanwhile, Daisy is confronted by her old team as Eldon battles his nerves.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shark Bites
channel.desc: This time on Shark Bites, Steve Backshall meets a night-time ninja. The whitetip reef shark has a cool and calm character by day, but after dark they turn into highly honed hunters. Scouring the reef, they search out prey that's hiding away in coral caves. Steve gets a closer look at them off the coast of Malaysian Borneo and gets under their skin in his Shark Lab to explain how they can fit where other sharks can't.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Shaun steps in a can of red paint, and his resulting red hoof makes him a style icon on the farm. Before long, the rest of the flock try their own new looks and soon steal the limelight. As the outfits become more and more outrageous, Shaun wonders if less might sometimes be more.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Stuff is going missing all over the world, but the team are distracted, fascinated by Squawk?s new Futuroid camera, which incredibly spits out snaps of future events. DM is aghast when the camera produces a photo of him and Squawk kissing! When Penfold is abducted by an alien tractor-beam, Squawk and Danger Mouse must overcome their mutual disgust to work together. Their search for Penfold leads them to Flarg, the alien who?s been nabbing the world?s missing items. Chained upside down, and with Flarg intent on stealing everything in existence, the situation looks hopeless.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: After Dennis persuades Pieface that Paul is an undercover superhero, Gnasher, JJ and Rubi go along with the story and help Dennis to 'prove' it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Boy realises that the family doesn?t have any kind of safety drill to use in an emergency, so he decides to train the family to become a well-oiled safety machine. But with the kids so busy practising the new drill, nobody hears the news about an escaped lion heading their way..

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings activate the air conditioner's AI, causing it to fall in love with the fridge.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy finds a polar bear and realises they are from the same species.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit must teach the agents in the Odd Squad Arctic office how to solve a case for themselves.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: The gang thought they had mummy babysitting all wrapped up. But then the Brat King steals their senses and deserts them, and now they must use their foggy senses to track him down.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Much to Trevor?s irritation, a rare phoenix woodpecker takes a liking to him - so he demands an immediate quest to return the bird to its real home.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Joy wants to check up on Danny and Mick, so has called in a mystery undercover customer to keep them on their toes. The boys think they can beat this test by working out who the undercover customer is - but there are a lot of needy customers in the centre today, and it could be anybody. So, one by one, Danny and Mick set out to narrow down the list of suspects in their own chaotic way.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Get Arty
channel.desc: The Kwapongs craft cardboard games consoles you can actually play, Julian Beever warps reality with a pavement pork pie, and Tilly Lockey draws a shimmering mermaid.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings accidentally set off a mechanism in a tower.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dodger
channel.desc: When a heist goes wrong, Dodger is given his harshest punishment yet - school! Sent to the upper crust St Albion?s College, he must unravel the mystery of a secret society.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Wallace & Gromit: A Close Shave
channel.desc: Oscar-winning claymation comedy thriller from Nick Park, featuring the popular inventor and his dog. Wallace's whirlwind romance with the proprietor of the local wool shop puts his head in a spin, and Gromit is framed for sheep rustling in a fiendish criminal plot, meeting a sheep named Shaun along the way. Will Wallace snap out of his daze in time to rescue his canine companion.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
channel.desc: Giant is pranked by Nitro when he appears as a guest of honour at a fake school award ceremony! The other Gladiators have sneaky fun backstage at Sheffield Arena.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: So Awkward Academy
channel.desc: Lily fakes being sick, Claire pretends to care, Jin tries to look healthy, Tam puts on a show at being helpful, and Mr Malone pretends to be confident to win over Miss Marmaduke.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: A Kind of Spark
channel.desc: Frank?s history tour descends into chaos when Bonnie returns to Juniper determined to cause trouble. Keedie warns Addie to take care, but Addie feels a connection - can she help her.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: An emotional episode as one of the players suddenly takes ill. Some viewers might find this upsetting. While Hawx are reeling from Alex?s bombshell, can Christina finally conquer her demons.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly Mission Shark
channel.desc: Bad weather causes sea sickness amongst the team, and their next diving lesson has to be abandoned. Steve worries they are running out of time and gives his recruits a pep talk to try and boost spirits. He takes the team to Honeymoon Harbour, an island location where they can meet some magnificent rays. Then it's time for a marathon clean-up as half the team comb the beach for litter. Meanwhile, the others join Steve for an underwater clean-up of the seagrass beds that help make the area a shark sanctuary.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Finding themselves lost in the labyrinth backstage, the Odd Socks split up and face a race against time. Can they make it back to the stage in time to start the gig.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: The bros go back to school as undercover teachers but have to do as the other says! Luckily, Glow Up Star Axel is there to help disguise the Bros as Mr Longgrass and Mr Pickles.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: While testing out the new Terra-Gup 6, Tweak crash lands in the desert.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: When a pack of pesky, migrating trilobites overrun the ship, Big Lizard has to use a hidden talent to lure them away. But one little trilobite, Rex, decides to stay.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Whilst waiting to pick up Penfold?s vacationing cousin from New Zealand, Pinfold, at the airport, Danger Mouse receives orders to stop Burt Badboy?s spree of mass statue defacement. When Penfold pops to the toilet moments before Pinfold arrives, a distracted DM mistakenly jets off with Penfold?s cousin in tow, leaving Penfold stranded at the airport. As DM races off to stop Badboy, unwittingly bringing Pinfold along for the ride, Penfold commandeers various modes of transport hoping to catch up with them at Nelson?s Column, a pristine tempting target for Badboy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: When Gran's Harley gets impounded, Dennis thinks she's lost her groove and given up on her thrill-seeking ways. In trying to help her, Dennis accidentally becomes Old Man Dennis, and teams up with Gran to prove you're never too old to be a rebel.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: An angry Swampclops follows the heroes back from their quest for a giant raspberry, so Hoofius must abandon his chances of winning the bake-off.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Keeping Team Brawl?s secret leaves Ariana torn. Michelle and Eldon take a look back at their past as Anthony avoids confronting his present.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: The Rising Volt Tacklers are visited by Dot?s mum, and she?s here to take Dot home.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Taffy
channel.desc: Bentley cannot help himself and chases all the tennis balls he sees. Finding out that Mrs Muchmore's match is soon, Taffy sees it as an opportunity to get rid of Bentley for good.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Deep
channel.desc: Ant tries to locate a 'diamond-horned sea-unicorn' as a present for Fontaine?s birthday. But Dolos and Devil Daniels are also hunting it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis discovers that Ralf the janitor is the legendary Prankmaster General and is told he could become his successor. Walter won't let this happen and challenges him to a prank battle to win Ralf's book of pranking - the infamous Prankypedia.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse's attempts to boost Penfold's confidence backfire when they lead to a ferocious games monster escaping into the real world.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: When a sheriff tries to clean up her town and kick out Stinky Dan McGrubb, she orders a cleaning squad from the Ninjas.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation. Set on a remote rural farm, Shaun's flock lives a peaceful life under the watchful eye of their sheepdog Bitzer. The sheep discover a mysterious buzzing object in their field. Shaun investigates and finds it's full of bees, who make the flock's life a misery.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings build an airborne craft made of Chinese umbrellas to steal the TV.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Boy finally meets his penpal, Gretchen, in person. However, she is nothing like she described herself in their letters. Something is off, and Boy wants to get to the bottom of it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When Blossom accidentally uses a witch?s broom to make sticks for toasting marshmallows, the owner of the broom casts a spell of squeaky voices on all the heroes. The spell will be lifted once the heroes have returned with new broomstick branches. A simple enough quest, think the heroes, until they realise that a witch?s broom can only be made from the branches of the Really Spooky Tree.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit?s first case is to return a plant to the 17th dimension.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Oswald must learn everything he can about the Mobile Unit van before an important interview.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: The kids invent an admirer for Chef, hoping to make him happy enough to order them pizza.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug faces Monarch.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Liko, Roy and Dot begin their first day of Tera training in the Paldea Region.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: Graven ups the ante with his most insidious attack yet: entering the Scions? minds and tormenting their dreams with fear and self-doubt. Myridell does her best to train the Scions in the Gormian way, fortifying their mental powers, but it?s all too much for Zane, who threatens to leave the Scions.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Ethan wrestles with an important decision that could impact both the studio and his relationship, while Daisy?s plan to save Heath and Pascale?s relationship backfires.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter Challenges
channel.desc: Gladiators? stars Apollo and Electro surprise children in a Salford school when they lead a PE lesson with a difference.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: The Farmer tasks Bitzer with baling up a fresh haystack, but the hungry sheep have hidden inside and are turned into moving bales. A wild game of chase the bale results as Bitzer tries to restore order to the hay field.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. Danger Mouse is forced to choose between dedication to duty and friendship when he battles the Baron in his underwater Toadlantis base.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: The world-famous Wonder Sausage is on show in Butch Butcher's shop. Walter realises the sausage has a strange hypnotic effect on Gnasher so uses it to make him perform his every whim! Dennis can't understand why Gnasher has turned against him and has to use all his heartfelt pleas and happy memories to try and win Gnasher back.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When the family signs up for the neighbourhood watch, Dog is excited to relive his police dog days. However, when Old Lady McGuire?s stinky camembert cheese is taken, Dog?s investigations lead him back home.

channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings discover an ancestral tree that casts maledictions.

channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings find a futuristic underground site.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit must teach the agents in the Odd Squad Arctic office how to solve a case for themselves.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: Charlie sneaks a monster into school in order to look cool in front of the bullies. But when it possesses one of the teachers, the gang must bottle the monster before the lunch bell.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes and the Council of Happiness swap jobs, and when the council fail in their quest, the whole forest is at risk of being flooded by Stinkystuff.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Joy has a new fitness device for Danny and Mick and wants to test them out to see if they are as fit as they should be. When Lance gets in on the action she decides to make a competition with a prize for the contestant who does the most steps by the end of the day. Mick takes it very seriously indeed, Lance is confident he will win and Danny comes up with more and more imaginative ways to cheat. Come closing time it's anyone's guess who has put their best foot forward.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Get Arty
channel.desc: The Kwapongs get messy paint-marbling their furniture, Nathan Wyburn paints Bukayo Saka on toast, and Horrible Histories? Martin Brown draws a Georgian lady and a Viking warrior.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Marinette discovers Shanghai and her own origins.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Zagazoo
channel.desc: A tale from Quentin Blake's Box of Treasures. Happy couple Bella and George are surprised to receive a strange parcel containing a baby named Zagazoo, who unexpectedly transforms into a series of badly behaved animals, including a vulture, an elephant, a warthog and a hairy monster, mirroring the various tricky stages of childhood and testing their parental skills to the limit as they try to adapt to their challenging offspring. A touching and hilarious story about growing up and the bond of love that keeps a tight family together.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings adopt a cute insect that eats wood. And what's made of wood? The cabin.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: So Awkward Academy
channel.desc: Zak decides to raise money for charity, but things get hairy for Mr Malone and the kids when Miss Marmaduke bans moustaches.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: A Kind of Spark
channel.desc: Audrey organises a Shark Day for Addie as a way to break her big news. However, Jenna?s crush, Emily?s guilt and a break-in at the shop threaten to derail Audrey?s plans.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: The Hawx players try to come to terms with the tragic events of their last game. Leah rallies the team, who must decide whether to continue playing in the Wigmo Cup.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly Mission Shark
channel.desc: It?s time to celebrate, as Steve Backshall?s team of ten shark saviours have all passed their dive training and are now fully qualified scuba divers. For their first underwater shark encounter, the team dive with Steve to meet nurse sharks, a species they have only met before from the safety of the dive boat. The experience convinces them that sharks are an extremely special species that need protecting.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: After a surprise visit from Blu?s gran reveals that Blu hasn?t told her that he?s in a band, the Odd Socks are forced into pretending that he is a lawyer. Can they keep up the lie.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Max and Harvey host the Queasy Spa quiz, where the bros face some nauseating treatments! And can they pilot their own water jet packs in the Ultimate Memory Test.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: A Portuguese man o' war washes ashore; the Octonauts need to reunite him with his legion.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Searching for a vital part of the ship that was lost during their crash-landing, Cosima and Big Lizard find Dunk stuck on a beach. They use science to save the day and make a new friend.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Penfold?s countless hours spent playing Giraffe Warriors pay off when he gets the highest score of all time. Before he can celebrate and convince Danger Mouse that a video game win is a real life win, the pair are whisked off to the planet which inspired the game, where Penfold is asked to defend it from an alien invasion! With DM sidelined Penfold must take up the mantle of the last giraffe warrior, a hero destined to save the planet from peril.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Dennis is blamed for a theft he didn't commit, and Mrs Creecher's new super-powered tech specs mean she can suddenly see way too well. She teams up with Sergeant Slipper to track down fugitive Dennis who has to somehow hide from the all-seeing tech specs so he can prove his innocence and find the real culprit.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: When tasked with the simple quest of building a flat-packed wardrobe, the heroes fail to read the instructions and are whirled into a wonky world.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: Pete tries to juggle both the Brawl and regionals, but it may be too much. Ethan discovers a huge secret within A-Troupe, and Olive is suspicious of Ariana and Grace?s friendship.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: During a day at the beach, Liko and Roy meet a Pok?mon with a superhero secret.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Taffy
channel.desc: Mrs Muchmore is giving her belongings to various charity shops around town. Bentley makes sure that Taffy is going, with the donations. Once the raccoon realises what happened, he joins forces with the shop's residents to escape.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Deep
channel.desc: The Nektons try to save an island from the 'purple tide' that legend says will destroy everything. To save it, they need to locate the Protector.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Mayor Wilbur passes a law to increase healthy eating in Beanotown, replacing all foods with peas...of the mushy variety! The gang must avoid the people of Beanotown who are rapidly turning into Zompeas after eating the green mush. Dennis uses the only ordinary peas in town to sabotage Wilbur's mush-making factory and save the day.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Brunel, the crazed time-travelling Victorian gentlechimp, is back and determined to change history so that Danger Mouse and Penfold never meet.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: A frantic bride needs a romantic ice sculpture to appease her nervous groom, so the Ninjas travel to the north pole to deliver a wedding day she will never forget.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation. Set on a remote rural farm, Shaun's flock leads a peaceful life under the watchful eye of their sheepdog, Bitzer, but Shaun's insatiable curiosity often leads him into the unlikeliest adventures. One dark and stormy night the flock are unable to sleep. Shaun investigates a series of sinister events only to discover who is really scaring the sheep.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The mood of a raccoon becomes contagious to all those around him.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: When Girl gets the chance to put together the school fair, her friends and family jump at the chance to help - until she gets advice from a hardened businesswoman.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Hoofius has decided not to quest. Not because he would rather be doing a puzzle or playing his panpipes (though that is rather enjoyable), but because this will be his 1,000th quest and will be added to the Scroll of Honour for all to see for eternity. His friends reluctantly quest without him, but when they don?t return, Hoofius soon comes to regret staying behind.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit must return a blob to London, but their van has run into trouble.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit must return a blob to London, but their van has run into trouble.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Total Dramarama
channel.desc: Duncan and Courtney make a quick escape to try and replace Chef's special energy drink.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Stormy Weather - aka Aurore Bor?ale.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Liko and Floragato try out Terastallisation in a battle against Cortondo Gym leader Katy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: The Scions? world is rocked as they uncover a dark secret about Myridell, setting off a ripple effect as they each come to terms with secrets of their own. Can the team restore their trust in one another in time to pull off Fusion and protect the Shard of the Soul of Gorm.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: It's the final day of the Brawl, and Team Micheldon's clash with the Masked Dancers is The Next Step's last hope to save the studio.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter Challenges
channel.desc: Challenges, celebrities, makes and adventures with the Blue Peter team.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: This is CBBC!
channel.desc: Tune every day from 7.00am.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Realising that Bitzer has a series of whistles which can control the flock?s movements, Shaun steals them and soon has the flock dancing to his tune. When the Farmer finds the whistles stuck together like a harmonica, his dreadful playing gives Shaun a taste of his own medicine.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Animated series. Danger Mouse's attempts at gardening lead to a gigantic Welsh space plant taking over the world and an attack of intergalactic bees. Only Penfold's jam obsession can save the day.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Gnasher finds a Gnashersaurus rex thigh bone while digging in Beanotown Park! A long-lost relative! It's not long before Walter and Dr Pfoofleffer hatch a plan to create a whole new living dinosaur from the bone! Dennis and his pals must save Gnasher's ancestor and hide him in a place where no-one will notice a fully grown dinosaur..

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: The siblings try to break their annoying habits for the sake of family peace. At first they offer each other support, but then one-by-one they start to give up. Only Boy and Girl keep going, but can they make it to the end of 24 hours.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Newsround
channel.desc: Topical news magazine for children.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: The Lemmings find a jewel that gives them total control over the fireflies.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Oswald has to go undercover as a robot to enter a villain warehouse run by robots.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Strange Chores
channel.desc: When the archive room floods, the gang are up a creek without a paddle. Adrift on a floating bookshelf with a crew of monsters, the gang's paranoia brings their worst fears to light.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: The heroes are made to clean the Cave of Mirrors as punishment for frolicking before a quest is complete, and they accidentally release the Party Harpy.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Joy is being particularly harsh on the boys - well, they did just spray ketchup on her best and only party dress - so to cheer Mick up, Danny puts on the freshly cleaned dress to do a silly impression of her. When the zip gets stuck and Danny is unable to get the dress off again, it seems like their day cannot get any worse. Which is when Mick gets his tie caught in the dress's zip while trying to unstick it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Go Get Arty
channel.desc: The Kwapongs make a bug jungle, Chris Howarth makes sand art waves, and Rob Biddulph shows how to draw a furry monster.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy wakes up, starving. But the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty..

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon: Diamond and Pearl
channel.desc: Giratina is the only Pok?mon living in the mysterious Reverse World. Enraged when Palkia and Dialga disrupt time and space, it drags Dialga into this realm for a battle.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: So Awkward Academy
channel.desc: It?s the final of reality TV show The Betrayers, and Lily goes to extreme lengths to ensure she doesn?t miss it. Novelist and former student Rufus returns to Cranmede.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: A Kind of Spark
channel.desc: Addie is on the hunt for a good news story about Juniper, but Bonnie is determined to prove there isn?t one. Could the bookshop provide the answer Addie is looking for.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Jamie Johnson FC
channel.desc: It?s the final of the Wigmo Cup and tensions are running high. A surprise visitor boosts the Hawx players, but can they show they have what it takes to beat Foxborough.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly Mission Shark
channel.desc: It is time for a competitive BioBlitz as the team splits into two to see which can find the most species against the clock. They then reunite to travel with Steve to meet the resident dolphins and help marine scientist Kel Mellilo-Sweeting with her research. Under supervision, they are allowed to swim with the pod and witness some rarely seen behaviour as the dolphins create circular patterns on the seabed. It?s an incredible encounter for our young divers.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Charlie is fast asleep in bed and is about to be late for school once again. With a ticket to an Odd Socks gig in jeopardy, can the band wake him up and get him to school on time.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Bro's in Control
channel.desc: Adam and Joe are joined by their dogs to help them in the kitchen! What could go wrong? The fluffy sous chefs get to work on baking Callum?s dog Bailey a doggy treat.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Octonauts: Above & Beyond
channel.desc: The Octonauts protect some creatures from getting wet when the rain shadow effect fails.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Dad drops an essential gizmo in a hard-to-reach place. Big Lizard takes them on an underwater adventure to meet Ammon, the tentacled solution to their problem.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Danger Mouse and Penfold are introduced to Squawk?s latest invention ? a warp drive device that will transport HQ anywhere in the universe at a moment?s notice. Squawk?s demonstration seems to go without a hitch - that is until the gang notice an exact duplicate of the HQ across the road, with identical duplicates of the Danger Team inside. When the duplicate Big Head is activated and starts causing mayhem the two DMs join forces to try and stop her.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Rubi gets a place in a Summer School for Super Smart Kids, which turns out to be one of Walter's tricks so he can learn the secrets of her new invention.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Mr Friendlyface accompanies the heroes on a quest and makes everything worse by angering a Big Ole Worm, putting all their lives in danger.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: As the regionals qualifier clashes with the Brawl?s, A-Troupe struggle under the weight of all the secrets they have kept from each other.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: While shopping in a seaside town, Liko and Roy receive a strange invitation to battle.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Taffy
channel.desc: At the ski resort, Taffy saves a yeti, Blanche, from her pursuer, the infamous trapper Ronald. Blanche tells Taffy that if he is ever in trouble, he will just need to whistle and she will come to his rescue.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Deep
channel.desc: Ant wants to go faster than the speediest fish in the sea - the sailfish. But he hasn?t counted on a deadly oil spill that threatens to destroy them.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
channel.desc: Walter attempts to ruin The Dinmakers' chance of reaching fame. He will stop at nothing - even wearing a frock and pretending to be a fan called Wanda who loves Dennis in order to break up the band.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: When Danger Mouse and Penfold are sent on a rescue mission to a mysterious island, Danger Mouse's over-competitiveness borders on criminal.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ninja Express
channel.desc: Needing a rocking horse for his daughter?s birthday present, a dad asks Ninja Express for help, only for them to return with the legendary Trojan Horse.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Shaun the Sheep
channel.desc: Children's animation. When the flock nip off on the bus to the local funfair, it is up to Shaun to distract the Farmer until Bitzer can round up the lost sheep.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
channel.desc: Grizzy finds an electrode that controls a robot, and the Lemmings plot to take it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Dog has been hired as a security guard at the new community pool. When the kids discover the long line at the pool, they try to convince Dog to break the rules and let them in.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Super Happy Magic Forest
channel.desc: Trevor is extremely proud of being the clever one in the gang and thinks that his smart mouth is his superpower. However, his friends feel that sometimes his jokes go too far - and they are right to be concerned! When Mr Friendlyface sends the heroes on a quest to prevent Toothgrinder the Ogre from messing up the village green, it?s Trevor?s smart mouth that puts all the heroes in danger.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: Omar and Oswald search for the perfect gifts for Orla?s 500th birthday.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Odd Squad
channel.desc: The Mobile Unit is accidentally locked out of their van.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter Challenges
channel.desc: Challenges, celebrities, makes and adventures with the Blue Peter team.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
channel.desc: Ladybug faces Adrien?s friend Nino, now known as The Bubbler.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon Horizons
channel.desc: Roy?s first Tera training test pits him against a familiar face - gym leader Brassius.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Gormiti: The New Era
channel.desc: Enjoying a welcome break from their battle, Carter, Zane and Glen compete in their soccer team?s championship game. However, there is no time to celebrate their impressive victory, as Graven is making his move on Gorm! Nervous but ready, the Scions race to confront him - with devastating results.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: With the Brawl concluded, The Next Step use their recent fame to fundraise, while Lucien plots to destroy the studio once and for all - but not if A-Troupe has anything to say about it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Blue Peter Challenges
channel.desc: Challenges, celebrities, makes and adventures with the Blue Peter team.
